name: R5-DetectedIssueSeverity-R4-DetectedIssueSeverity
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 DetectedIssueSeverity into FHIR R4

element.display: Indicates the issue may be life-threatening or has the potential to cause permanent injury.

target.display: Indicates the issue may be life-threatening or has the potential to cause permanent injury.

element.display: Indicates the issue may result in some adverse consequences but is unlikely to substantially affect the situation of the subject.

target.display: Indicates the issue may result in some adverse consequences but is unlikely to substantially affect the situation of the subject.

element.display: Indicates the issue may result in noticeable adverse consequences but is unlikely to be life-threatening or cause permanent injury.

target.display: Indicates the issue may result in noticeable adverse consequences but is unlikely to be life-threatening or cause permanent injury.
